module.name: Queues
module.description: Creates a queue where calls are placed on hold and answered on a first-in, first-out basis. Many options are available, including ring strategy for agents, caller announcements, max wait times, etc.
module.changelog: *13.0.31* FREEPBX-12966 Errors in Queue pause dialplan *13.0.30* FREEPBX-12906 *13.0.29* Fix adding of call queues with modern databases (FreePBX-12845) by lidl *13.0.28* FREEPBX-12592, FREEPBX-12754 *13.0.27* More checks for recording file before we force our own *13.0.26* FREEPBX-11871 Queue call recordings not accessible in UCP with Asterisk 13 *13.0.25* FREEPBX-12185 Queues not generating dialplan or hints for individual queue pauses *13.0.24* FREEPBX-9119 write out ivr context regardless *13.0.23* Speed up reload times with dynamic hints *13.0.22* Remove all cos references to hints *13.0.21* FREEPBX-11866 FREEPBX-11829 *13.0.20* FREEPBX-11525 Add dialstatus check *13.0.19* FREEPBX-11505 *47 (Play the caller count) doesnt work *13.0.18* FREEPBX-11238 Fix Q* logon and logoff *13.0.17* FREEPBX-11248 FREEPBX-11233 *13.0.16* Support Alert info drop down *13.0.15* FREEPBX-10450 *13.0.14* FREEPBX-11033 *13.0.13* FREEPBX-10938 *13.0.12* FREEPBX-10918 *13.0.11* Dont double border *13.0.10* FREEPBX-10655 Invalid array argument *13.0.9* FREEPBX-10277 Fix musiconhold *13.0.8* FREEPBX-10294 Correctly set periodic-announce option when using Queue Callback *13.0.7* FREEPBX-9896 FREEPBX-10300 Array validation. Update tooltip for PJSIP *13.0.6* FREEPBX-9896 ultra strict not selectable in queue capacity options *13.0.5* FREEPBX-9843 Fix misspelling *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9603 add tab for agents, FREEPBX-9603 prevent failover dest being empty *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9511 Queue Breakout IVRs not selectable *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha8* FREEPBX-9482 Display issue with Periodic Announcements in Queues *13.0.1alpha6* FREEPBX-9467 Update search hooks *13.0.1alpha5* FREEPBX-9434 Error page on queue edit / create *13.0.1alpha4* Add dynamic tab hooking to support BMO hooks and maintain backwards compatibility *13.0.1alpha3* Resolves FREEPBX-8610 and fixes the config aspect of FREEPBX-8216 that was overlooked. *13.0.1alpha2* Fix dialplan generation *13.0.1alpha1* Visual Changes
